overview: Granular Synthesis are the new media, video art, and music duo Kurt Hentschl√§ger and Ulf Langheinrich, who take their name from the practice of sampling "microsounds" (audio clips lasting 1 to 50 milliseconds) to create new compositions. Part of a series of video and installation pieces, "Sweetheart" features a single close-up of performer Akemi Takeya. It was produced for the Austrian T.V. network ORF.
title: Granular Synthesis: Sweetheart
